ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] just joined
ygData.msgSnippet: ... What would be even more awesome is if people would actually talk about their EQ Necromancers, that being the name of the group and the reason I joined...
ygData.messageBody:
--- Stuart Thomson <Stuart@...> wrote:
> Doesn't matter now, I've started a savage :)
>
> Any recommendations on where to put my specialization points into?
> I've put some in axe at the beginning just to get through the lvl's until 5
> but now I have the hand to hand skill I dont really need the points in axe,
> any advice from anyone would be great.

What would be even more awesome is if people would actually talk about their
EQ Necromancers, that being the name of the group and the reason I joined...

Ya know, I've found I'm able to solo red plaguebone skeletons in the city of
undead in the Dreadlands, thanks to the spells I just got at 29.

The real pain is finding the research-only spells up to this level, since
nobody seems to think them worth selling in Bazaar.

I still don't have Hungry Earth, which would probably dramatically improve my
soloing of red undead even now, letting me root them.

=====
There are things in the Constitution that have been overtaken by events, by time...Inappropriate, anachronistic, it isn't done anymore...
-- Chairman Henry Hyde, who doesn't believe the Constitution needs to be followed or legally changed, just ignored.
